name: The Old House
description:
Old House is a horror game in the genre of point-and-click in a minimalist style.

The game tells about the return of the protagonist to the Old House.
Had he been here before? And what made him come back?
Perhaps you will be able to find answers to these questions and unravel the secrets of the Old House.

Features of the game:
  • Unique graphic style
  • Authentic sound solutions
